content: a week of scrubbies useful in the kitchen or the bath these hand-size cleaning cloths are quick to make 6 x 4 inches finished weight about 20 grams double-ended or crohook 6 5 mm dishcloth cotton #4 and scrubby yarn each scrubby uses about 12 meters of each yarn with cotton yarn chain 21 make foundation row in tss when hook is full turn hook and attach scrubby yarn to other end make a return pass make a forward pass with scrubby turn and make return pass with cotton work 7 row of each yarn and bind off in cotton sew in ends dela wilkins 2017 page 1
